But better keep them as they are because this duology has wonderful engine etc-sound effects.
Watch them loud in an afternoon if you got neighbours, then you'll see the point I mean.
Of course you can convert a track then switch between the 1500 & 768 KB/s during an action then hear the difference.
I do them 768 KB/s in movies (drama for instance) with "nothing special"-sounds.
Cheers.
